thread.title: Trump pardons late boxer Jack Johnson

title: Trump pardons late boxer Jack Johnson
text:
Trump pardons late boxer Jack Johnson 02:18
U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday issued a pardon for the late heavyweight boxing champion Jack Johnson, an African-American convicted a century ago for the crime of taking a woman across state lines, saying the move corrected a wrong in American history. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
